Package cloud.robots.bridge.client.core

Interface BridgeBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBridgeBuilderImpl

    public interface BridgeBuilder
    A generic builder for creating a Bridge
    Since:
    0.1.0-SNAPSHOT
    See Also:
    Bridge

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bridge build()
      Create the bridge with the desired configuration
      BridgeBuilder connect(java.lang.String serverUrl)
      Specify to which url the bridge will connect

      Specify the refresh intervals for fetching messages

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        BridgeBuilder connect(java.lang.String serverUrl)
        Specify to which url the bridge will connect
        Parameters:
        serverUrl - url to the sever
        Returns:
        a new instance of the builder

      • subscribe

        BridgeBuilder subscribe(java.lang.String topic,
                        java.util.function.Consumer<Message> callback)
        Set a subscription to a topic
        Parameters:
        topic - the desired topic to be subscribed
        callback - callback function to be invoke with each message on this topic, could be a lambda
        Returns:
        a new instance of the builder

      • timeout

        BridgeBuilder timeout(int milliseconds)
        Specify socket and connection timeouts
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - milliseconds to timeout
        Returns:
        a new instance of the builder

      • refresh

        BridgeBuilder refresh(int milliseconds)
        Specify the refresh intervals for fetching messages
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - interval in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a new instance of the builder

      • ignoreSelfMessages

        BridgeBuilder ignoreSelfMessages(boolean ignoreSelf)
        Set to ignore our own messages to topics.
        Parameters:
        ignoreSelf - true if we ignore our messages
        Returns:
        a new instance of the builder

      • build

        Bridge build()
      throws BridgeException
        Create the bridge with the desired configuration
        Returns:
        a new instance of the bridge
        Throws:
        BridgeException - if any error occurs
        See Also:
